name: Trials to Bliss
description:
You wake up on a floating platform with only a message, 

"To walk the path to paradise, You have to pass difficulties.

Now you are on your way, Pass the trials and reach bliss, Each trial rewards you only with 10 seconds, Beware to not let them reach zero."

An FP Perspective puzzle game that focuses on fast movement and quick wit, you need to solve the puzzle in each room before the timer runs, Once it does, Your heart would stop and you'll need to redo it again.

When all trials are passed you will be transported to paradise, to live in bliss.

THE GAME WAS MADE FOR GAMEJAM 192 IN 5 DAYS.

Controls:-

WASD - movement

Left Shift - sprint

Spacebar - jump

Left Mouse Button - interact
